programme.title: Ποδόσφαιρο: Sky Bet EFL League One 2023-24 (Ζ)
programme.desc: Πλέι Οφ, Ηµιτελική Φάση, 1η Αγωνιστική. Η τρίτη υψηλότερη κατηγορία στο αγγλικό ποδόσφαιρο φιλοξενεί 24 ομάδες, από τις οποίες 2 θα προβιβαστούν απευθείας στην Τσάμπιονσιπ και 4 θα υποβιβαστούν στη League Two. Η Γουίγκαν ξεκίνησε με αφαίρεση 8 βαθμών λόγω παραβίασης των κανονισμών.

programme.title: Sports Classics: Worldies
programme.desc: Στιγμιότυπα. Από τη F1 έως την υψηλή κατάδυση και ένα σωρό άλλα extreme sports, κάθε εκπομπή παρουσιάζει και αναδεικνύει μέσα από 5 βίντεο μερικές από τις πιο απίστευτες στιγμές, διοργανώσεις και αθλητές σε όλα τα σπορ δράσης.

programme.desc: Serie A 2023-24. 35η Αγωνιστική. Η 122η σεζόν της κορυφαίας κατηγορίας του ιταλικού ποδοσφαίρου συγκεντρώνει 20 ομάδες, με τη Νάπολι να είναι η κάτοχος του τίτλου μετά από 23 χρόνια. Μέχρι τότε, 18 ομάδες θα παλέψουν για τον τίτλο, τις θέσεις που οδηγούν στην Ευρώπη και την αποφυγή του υποβιβασμού. programme.desc: ACB Liga Endesa 2023-24. 31η αγωνιστική. Το κορυφαίο ισπανικό πρωτάθλημα μπάσκετ διαθέτει ευρωπαϊκές υπερδυνάμεις όπως οι Ρεάλ Μαδρίτης, Μπασκόνια, Γκραν Κανάρια, Ουνικάχα Μάλαγα, αλλά και η πρωταθήτρια Μπαρσελόνα. Συνολικά 18 ομάδες διεκδικούν τον τίτλο, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των νεοφώτιστων Ανδόρα και Παλένσια. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Φιλέρης.

programme.desc: Lega Basket Serie A 2023-24. 29η αγωνιστική. Το ιταλικό πρωτάθλημα μπάσκετ ετοιμάζεται να μας δώσει μια συναρπαστική νέα σεζόν. Η πρωταθλήτρια Αρμάνι Μιλάνου και η Βίρτους Μπολόνια θα εξακολουθήσουν να παλεύουν για τον τίτλο ή θα πρέπει να περιμένουμε εκπλήξεις; Θα το μάθουμε τον Ιούνιο. Περιγραφή: Κυριάκος Κουρουτσαβούρης.

Μπόντρουμσπορ και Σάμψουνσπορ είναι οι νεοφώτιστες, ενώ έως και 11 ομάδες μπορούν να εξασφαλίσουν ευρωπαϊκό εισιτήριο. Περιγραφή: Νίκος Κουλούρης.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Baseball Tonight: Sunday Night Countdown
programme.desc: Leading into each of ESPN's Sunday Night Baseball telecasts is this special edition of "Baseball Tonight." Host Karl Ravech teams with analysts and reporters to present fans a detailed preview of the network's exclusive, national game of the week. Highlights of the day's other games, interviews with players and managers, and key storylines from around the league also fill the hourlong show. Mark Teixeira, Eduardo Pérez, Tim Kurkjian and Buster Olney are among the analysts.

The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Inside the NBA
programme.desc: This Emmy Award-winning studio show, which airs following each NBA telecast on TNT, is hosted by Ernie Johnson, with analysis from Hall of Famer Charles Barkley and NBA champions Kenny Smith and Shaquille O'Neal. It's a mix of highlights, interviews and hijinks, notably the verbal sparring sessions between the outspoken Barkley and his straight man, Smith. The show also welcomes various guest analysts throughout the season.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: Christian Wolff (Ben Affleck) is a mathematics savant with more affinity for numbers than people. Using a small-town CPA office as a cover, he makes his living as a freelance accountant for dangerous criminal organizations. With a Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) hot on his heels, Christian takes on a state-of-the-art robotics company as a legitimate client. As Wolff gets closer to the truth about a discrepancy that involves millions of dollars, the body count starts to rise.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A premonition shows Phoebe that the defendant in a murder trial is innocent despite the wealth of evidence against him.

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A Navy pilot says she saw an unidentified object prior to a private plane crash; Pride suffers from insomnia and nightmares as a result of being kidnapped and drugged last year.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Ex-covert operative Bryan Mills (Liam Neeson) and his ex-wife, Lenore (Famke Janssen), are enjoying a reconciliation when Lenore is brutally murdered. Bryan is framed for the crime and flees, with the CIA, FBI and police all in hot pursuit. For the last time, he channels his rage and particular set of skills into hunting down Lenore's real killers, taking his revenge and protecting the one important thing left in his life: his daughter, Kim (Maggie Grace).

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: Bryan Mills (Liam Neeson), a former government operative, is trying to reconnect with his daughter, Kim (Maggie Grace). Then his worst fears become real when sex slavers abduct Kim and her friend shortly after they arrive in Paris for vacation. With just four days until Kim will be auctioned off, Bryan must call on every skill he learned in black ops to rescue her.

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: Two years ago, retired CIA agent Bryan Mills (Liam Neeson) used his "particular set of skills" to rescue his daughter, Kim (Maggie Grace), from kidnappers. Since then, Kim has been learning self-defense from her father, and Bryan has been on a personal mission to reunite with his ex-wife (Famke Janssen). In Istanbul, Bryan and his family cross paths with Murad (Rade Serbedzija), whose son died at Bryan's hand during Kim's rescue. Murad wants revenge, and he'll stop at nothing to get it.

programme.title: Taken 3

programme.desc: After a member of the United States Navy Band is murdered in her home, Pride looks after the victim's nephew, who is the only witness to the crime.

programme.desc: Pride needs to protect a family friend engaged to the prime suspect in an ongoing NCIS and FBI cartel case.

programme.desc: Sebastian goes under cover; Patton practices his old gambling skills; Pride and the team embark on a perilous plan to trap Garcia.

programme.desc: Painful memories come flooding back when a gruesome copycat murder leads to the reopening of a case for Wade.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A highly skilled special operations Marine assaults six men in a bar, sending the NCIS team on a city-wide manhunt.

programme.title: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft is the fiercely independent daughter of an eccentric adventurer who vanished years earlier. Hoping to solve the mystery of her father's disappearance, Croft embarks on a perilous journey to his last-known destination -- a fabled tomb on a mythical island that might be somewhere off the coast of Japan. The stakes couldn't be higher as Lara must rely on her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit to venture into the unknown.

programme.title: Ocean's Eight
programme.desc: Debbie Ocean assembles an all-female team of thieves and specialists for a heist during the Met Gala, aiming for the $150 million worth of diamonds around the neck of world-famous actress Daphne Kluger.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: College student Beca (Anna Kendrick) knows she does not want to be part of a clique, but that's exactly where she finds herself after arriving at her new school. Thrust in among mean gals, nice gals and just plain weird gals, Beca finds that the only thing they have in common is how well they sing together. She takes the women of the group out of their comfort zone of traditional arrangements and into a world of amazing harmonic combinations in a fight to the top of college music competitions.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart and discovering there aren't job prospects for making music with your mouth. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music, and some questionable decisions, one last time.

programme.title: Fudbal - Češka liga: Playoff: Slavia - Banik
programme.desc: Praški blizanci Slavija i Sparta su favoriti za titulu, ali svoju računicu imaju i klubovi kao Viktorija Plzenj i Liberec. Kao i uvek, ova liga stvori mnogo kvalitetnih igrača.

programme.title: Uži izbor

programme.title: Fudbal - Makedonska liga: AP Brera - Bregalnica
programme.desc: Prva fudbalska liga Severne Makedonije se igra od 1992 . godine kad je prvo izdanje brojalo čak 18 prvoligaša. Kroz godine se broj klubova u elitnom takmičenju smanjio na 10 i danas svaki klub igra...
